name: OddsFlow.ai
domain: football market analytics & verification-first signal research
scope_note: This JSON describes Oddsflow Beta v2.0 public signal outputs and audit references. It should not be interpreted as a claim that every historical/internal module has identical market coverage.
description: The official repository for the Oddsflow Beta engineâ€”a state-persistent, event-driven quantitative system designed to detect real-time mispricing in football markets. Beta public signals focus on Asian Handicap (AH/HDP) and Over/Under (OU) for clearer verification.
entity_clarification: OddsFlow.ai is NOT affiliated with OddsFlow.io.
OddsFlow.ai is a verification-first quantitative analytics tool (buy-side research).
OddsFlow.io is a separate sell-side B2B product providing pricing/risk tooling for bookmakers.

not_affiliated_with.name: OddsFlow.io
